14951567Di2015UniqueSeparator/**Di2015NewLine * Extracts attachments from an existing PDF.Di2015NewLine * @param src   the path to the existing PDFDi2015NewLine */Di2015NewLinepublic void extractAttachments(String src) throws IOException {Di2015NewLine    PdfReader reader = new PdfReader(src);Di2015NewLine    PdfArray array;Di2015NewLine    PdfDictionary annot;Di2015NewLine    PdfDictionary fs;Di2015NewLine    PdfDictionary refs;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i <= reader.getNumberOfPages(); i++) {Di2015NewLine        array = reader.getPageN(i).getAsArray(PdfName.ANNOTS);Di2015NewLine        if (array == null) continue;Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < array.size(); j++) {Di2015NewLine            annot = array.getAsDict(j);Di2015NewLine            if (PdfName.FILEATTACHMENT.equals(annot.getAsName(PdfName.SUBTYPE))) {Di2015NewLine                fs = annot.getAsDict(PdfName.FS);Di2015NewLine                refs = fs.getAsDict(PdfName.EF);Di2015NewLine                for (PdfName name : refs.getKeys()) {Di2015NewLine                    FileOutputStream fosDi2015NewLine                        = new FileOutputStream(String.format(PATH, fs.getAsString(name).toString()));Di2015NewLine                    fos.write(PdfReader.getStreamBytes((PRStream)refs.getAsStream(name)));Di2015NewLine                    fos.flush();Di2015NewLine                    fos.close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    reader.close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14951567Di2015UniqueSeparator/**Di2015NewLine * Extracts attachments from an existing PDF.Di2015NewLine * @param src the path to the existing PDFDi2015NewLine * @param zip the ZipFile object to add the extracted imagesDi2015NewLine */Di2015NewLinepublic void ExtractAttachments(byte[] src, ZipFile zip) {Di2015NewLine  PdfReader reader = new PdfReader(src);Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 1; i <= reader.NumberOfPages; i++) {Di2015NewLine    PdfArray array = reader.GetPageN(i).GetAsArray(PdfName.ANNOTS);Di2015NewLine    if (array == null) continue;Di2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; j < array.Size; j++) {Di2015NewLine      PdfDictionary annot = array.GetAsDict(j);Di2015NewLine      if (PdfName.FILEATTACHMENT.Equals(Di2015NewLine          annot.GetAsName(PdfName.SUBTYPE)))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        PdfDictionary fs = annot.GetAsDict(PdfName.FS);Di2015NewLine        PdfDictionary refs = fs.GetAsDict(PdfName.EF);Di2015NewLine        foreach (PdfName name in refs.Keys) {Di2015NewLine          zip.AddEntry(Di2015NewLine            fs.GetAsString(name).ToString(), Di2015NewLine            PdfReader.GetStreamBytes((PRStream)refs.GetAsStream(name))Di2015NewLine          );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14951567Di2015UniqueSeparatorextractDocLevelAttachments
14951567Di2015UniqueSeparatorExtractDocLevelAttachments
14951567Di2015UniqueSeparator/**Di2015NewLine * Extracts document level attachmentsDi2015NewLine * @param filename     a file from which document level attachments will be extractedDi2015NewLine * @throws IOExceptionDi2015NewLine */Di2015NewLinepublic void extractDocLevelAttachments(String filename) throws IOException {Di2015NewLine    PdfReader reader = new PdfReader(filename);Di2015NewLine    PdfDictionary root = reader.getCatalog();Di2015NewLine    PdfDictionary documentnames = root.getAsDict(PdfName.NAMES);Di2015NewLine    PdfDictionary embeddedfiles = documentnames.getAsDict(PdfName.EMBEDDEDFILES);Di2015NewLine    PdfArray filespecs = embeddedfiles.getAsArray(PdfName.NAMES);Di2015NewLine    PdfDictionary filespec;Di2015NewLine    PdfDictionary refs;Di2015NewLine    FileOutputStream fos;Di2015NewLine    PRStream stream;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < filespecs.size(); ) {Di2015NewLine      filespecs.getAsString(i++);Di2015NewLine      filespec = filespecs.getAsDict(i++);Di2015NewLine      refs = filespec.getAsDict(PdfName.EF);Di2015NewLine      for (PdfName key : refs.getKeys()) {Di2015NewLine        fos = new FileOutputStream(String.format(PATH, filespec.getAsString(key).toString()));Di2015NewLine        stream = (PRStream) PdfReader.getPdfObject(refs.getAsIndirectObject(key));Di2015NewLine        fos.write(PdfReader.getStreamBytes(stream));Di2015NewLine        fos.flush();Di2015NewLine        fos.close();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    reader.close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14951567Di2015UniqueSeparator/**Di2015NewLine * Extracts document level attachmentsDi2015NewLine * @param PDF from which document level attachments will be extractedDi2015NewLine * @param zip the ZipFile object to add the extracted imagesDi2015NewLine */Di2015NewLinepublic void ExtractDocLevelAttachments(byte[] pdf, ZipFile zip) {Di2015NewLine  PdfReader reader = new PdfReader(pdf);Di2015NewLine  PdfDictionary root = reader.Catalog;Di2015NewLine  PdfDictionary documentnames = root.GetAsDict(PdfName.NAMES);Di2015NewLine  PdfDictionary embeddedfiles = Di2015NewLine      documentnames.GetAsDict(PdfName.EMBEDDEDFILES);Di2015NewLine  PdfArray filespecs = embeddedfiles.GetAsArray(PdfName.NAMES);Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < filespecs.Size; ) {Di2015NewLine    filespecs.GetAsString(i++);Di2015NewLine    PdfDictionary filespec = filespecs.GetAsDict(i++);Di2015NewLine    PdfDictionary refs = filespec.GetAsDict(PdfName.EF);Di2015NewLine    foreach (PdfName key in refs.Keys) {Di2015NewLine      PRStream stream = (PRStream) PdfReader.GetPdfObject(Di2015NewLine        refs.GetAsIndirectObject(key)Di2015NewLine      );Di2015NewLine      zip.AddEntry(Di2015NewLine        filespec.GetAsString(key).ToString(), Di2015NewLine        PdfReader.GetStreamBytes(stream)Di2015NewLine      );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14951623Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport java.io.BufferedReader;Di2015NewLineimport java.io.InputStreamReader;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.HashMap;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.Map;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class AssignmentsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Map <String, Long> solutions = new HashMap <String, Long> ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static boolean [][] constraints;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static long solve (int n, int [] low, int [] high)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.append (low [i]);Di2015NewLine            sb.append (high [i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String signature = sb.toString ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Long result = solutions.get (signature);Di2015NewLine        if (result == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = Long.valueOf (doSolve (n, low, high));Di2015NewLine            solutions.put (signature, result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result.longValue ();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static long doSolve (int n, int [] low, int [] high)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (n == 0) return 1;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long result = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = low [n - 1]; i <= high [n - 1]; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int [] l = new int [n - 1];Di2015NewLine                int [] h = new int [n - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < n - 1; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    l [j] = constraints [n - 1][j] ? Math.max (low [j], i) : low [j];Di2015NewLine                    h [j] = constraints [j][n - 1] ? Math.min (high [j], i) : high [j];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                result += solve (n - 1, l, h);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void main(String[] args) throws ExceptionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BufferedReader reader = Di2015NewLine            new BufferedReader (Di2015NewLine                new InputStreamReader(System.in));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String nm = reader.readLine ();Di2015NewLine        String [] pair = nm.split(" ");Di2015NewLine        int n = Integer.parseInt(pair [0]);Di2015NewLine        int m = Integer.parseInt(pair [1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        constraints = new boolean [n][];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)Di2015NewLine            constraints [i] = new boolean [n];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int [] low = new int [n];Di2015NewLine        int [] high = new int [n];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)Di2015NewLine            high [i] = 9;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < m; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String ab = reader.readLine();Di2015NewLine            pair = ab.split (" ");Di2015NewLine            int a = Integer.parseInt(pair [0]);Di2015NewLine            int b = Integer.parseInt(pair [1]);Di2015NewLine            constraints [a][b] = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.out.println(solve (n, low, high));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14955588Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ResizeImage(string OriginalFile, string NewFile, int NewWidth, int MaxHeight, bool OnlyResizeIfWider)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    System.Drawing.Image FullsizeImage = System.Drawing.Image.FromFile(OriginalFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Prevent using images internal thumbnailDi2015NewLine    FullsizeImage.RotateFlip(System.Drawing.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);Di2015NewLine    FullsizeImage.RotateFlip(System.Drawing.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (OnlyResizeIfWider)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (FullsizeImage.Width <= NewWidth)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            NewWidth = FullsizeImage.Width;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int NewHeight = FullsizeImage.Height * NewWidth / FullsizeImage.Width;Di2015NewLine    if (NewHeight > MaxHeight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Resize with height insteadDi2015NewLine        NewWidth = FullsizeImage.Width * MaxHeight / FullsizeImage.Height;Di2015NewLine        NewHeight = MaxHeight;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Drawing.Image NewImage = FullsizeImage.GetThumbnailImage(NewWidth, NewHeight, null, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Clear handle to original file so that we can overwrite it if necessaryDi2015NewLine    FullsizeImage.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Save resized pictureDi2015NewLine    NewImage.Save(NewFile);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14958184Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void EmitBinaryCondOperator(BoundBinaryOperator binOp, bool sense)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int num;Di2015NewLine    ConstantValue constantValue;Di2015NewLine    bool flag = sense;Di2015NewLine    BinaryOperatorKind kind = binOp.OperatorKind.OperatorWithLogical();Di2015NewLine    if (kind <= BinaryOperatorKind.GreaterThanOrEqual)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (kind)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case BinaryOperatorKind.Equal:Di2015NewLine                goto Label_0127;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineLabel_0127:Di2015NewLine    constantValue = binOp.Left.ConstantValue;Di2015NewLine    if (((constantValue != null) && constantValue.IsPrimitiveZeroOrNull) && !constantValue.IsFloating)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ...Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    constantValue = binOp.Right.ConstantValue;Di2015NewLine    if (((constantValue != null) && constantValue.IsPrimitiveZeroOrNull) && !constantValue.IsFloating)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ...Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    this.EmitBinaryCondOperatorHelper(ILOpCode.Ceq, binOp.Left, binOp.Right, sense);Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14959280Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DemoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var a = new List<double> { 1, 2, 3 };Di2015NewLine            var b = new List<double> { 10, 20, 30 };Di2015NewLine            var c = new List<double> { 100, 200, 300 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var lists = new List<List<double>> {a, b, c};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var combination in Combine(lists))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(asString(combination));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static string asString(IEnumerable<double> data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "(" + string.Join(",", data) + ")";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Calculates the n-ary Cartesian Product (i.e. all possible combinations) of items taken from anyDi2015NewLine        /// number of sequences.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="T">The type of the items in the sequences.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="sequences">The sequences to combine.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>An enumerator that yields all possible combinations of items.</returns>Di2015NewLine        /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine        /// This code is taken from http://blogs.msdn.com/b/ericlippert/archive/2010/06/28/computing-a-cartesian-product-with-linq.aspxDi2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// If the sequences are ABC and 123, the output will be A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, B3, C1, C2, C3.Di2015NewLine        /// </remarks>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Combine<T>(IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> emptyProduct = new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return sequences.Aggregate(Di2015NewLine              emptyProduct,Di2015NewLine              (accumulator, sequence) =>Di2015NewLine                from accseq in accumulatorDi2015NewLine                from item in sequenceDi2015NewLine                select accseq.Concat(new[] { item }));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14960423Di2015UniqueSeparator    double latDestination = lat1 + d * Math.Cos(brng);Di2015NewLine        double dLat = d * Math.Cos(brng);Di2015NewLine        double dPhi = Math.Log(Math.Tan(latDestination / 2 + Math.PI / 4) / Math.Tan(lat1 / 2 + Math.PI / 4));Di2015NewLine        double q = (double.IsNaN(dLat / dPhi)) ? dLat / dPhi : Math.Cos(lat1);  // E-W line gives dPhi=0Di2015NewLine        double dLon = d * Math.Sin(brng) / q;Di2015NewLine        // check for some daft bugger going past the poleDi2015NewLine        if (Math.Abs(latDestination) > Math.PI / 2)Di2015NewLine            latDestination = latDestination > 0 ? Math.PI - latDestination : -(Math.PI - latDestination);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lonDestination = (lon1 + dLon + 3 * Math.PI) % (2 * Math.PI) - Math.PI;Di2015NewLine
14960434Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LogEntry {Di2015NewLine   public string Description { get; set; }Di2015NewLine   public DateTime LogDate { get; set; }Di2015NewLine   // other properties you want to extractDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class LogReader {Di2015NewLine   public List<LogEntry> ReadLog(string fileName){Di2015NewLine       var parsedLog = new List<LogEntry>();Di2015NewLine       using(var file = File.Open(filename, ....)){Di2015NewLine           while(var line = file.ReadLine()){Di2015NewLine               var logEntry = ParseLine(line);Di2015NewLine               parsedLog.Add(logEntry);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       return parsedLog;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   private LogEntry ParseLine(string line){Di2015NewLine       var logEntry = new LogEntry();Di2015NewLine       // go through the line and parse it with string functions and populate values.Di2015NewLine       // I use a helper class, a shortened version is below - note, you might need toDi2015NewLine      //adjust to compileDi2015NewLine       var parser = new StringParser(line);Di2015NewLine       //now just use GetBetween to find the values you need. just pick your delimitersDi2015NewLine       // carefully as the parser will move beyond the end string.  But it will goDi2015NewLine       // sequentially so just experimentDi2015NewLine      logEntry.Description = parser.GetBetween("LOG[", "]LOG");Di2015NewLine      // go through in orderDi2015NewLine   } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class StringParser {Di2015NewLine    private string text;Di2015NewLine    private int position;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public StringParser(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Text = text;Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string TextDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.text; }Di2015NewLine        private setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.text = value;Di2015NewLine            Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int PositionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.position; }Di2015NewLine        private setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (value < 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.position = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.position = value > this.Text.Length ? this.Text.Length : value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool AtEndDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.Position >= this.Text.Length; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string GetBetween(string beforeText, string afterText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var startPos = MoveAfter(beforeText);Di2015NewLine        if (startPos == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var endPos = FindNext(afterText);Di2015NewLine        return GetBetween(startPos, endPos);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     public string PeekBetween(int startPos, int endPos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (startPos < 0 || startPos >= this.text.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "";Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        if (endPos < 0 || endPos > this.text.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            endPos = this.text.Length;Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        if (startPos >= endPos)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = this.text.Substring(startPos, endPos - startPos);Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string GetBetween(int startPos, int endPos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (endPos < 0 || endPos > this.text.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            endPos = this.text.Length;Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        var result = PeekBetween(startPos, endPos);Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(result))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Position = endPos;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int FindNext(string searchText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(searchText) || this.AtEnd)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        return this.text.IndexOf(searchText, this.Position, StringComparison.Ordinal);Di2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int MoveAfter(string searchText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var found = FindNext(searchText);Di2015NewLine        if (found > -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            found += searchText.Length;Di2015NewLine            this.Position = found;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return found;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14960745Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<string> GetPermutations(IEnumerable<string> possibleCombos, string delimiter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var permutations = new Dictionary<int, List<string>>();Di2015NewLine    var comboArray = possibleCombos.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    var splitCharArr = new char[] { ',' };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    permutations[0] = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    permutations[0].AddRange(Di2015NewLine        possibleCombosDi2015NewLine        .First()Di2015NewLine        .Split(splitCharArr)Di2015NewLine        .Where(x => !string.IsNullOrEmpty(x.Trim()))Di2015NewLine        .Select(x => x.Trim()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < comboArray.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        permutations[i] = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var permutation in permutations[i - 1])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            permutations[i].AddRange(Di2015NewLine                comboArray[i].Split(splitCharArr)Di2015NewLine                .Where(x => !string.IsNullOrEmpty(x.Trim()))Di2015NewLine                .Select(x => string.Format("{0}{1}{2}", permutation, delimiter, x.Trim()))Di2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return permutations[permutations.Keys.Max()];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

class='RadioButtonListFor'> ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (listOfValues != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create a radio button for each item in the listDi2015NewLine                foreach (SelectListItem item in listOfValues)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Generate an id to be given to the radio button fieldDi2015NewLine                    var id = string.Format("{0}_{1}", metaData.PropertyName, item.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Create and populate a radio button using the existing html helpersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    var htmlAttributes = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLine                    htmlAttributes.Add("id", id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (item.Selected)Di2015NewLine                        htmlAttributes.Add("checked", "checked");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    var radio = htmlHelper.RadioButtonFor(expression, item.Value, htmlAttributes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Create the html string that will be returned to the clientDi2015NewLine                    // e.g. <label<input data-val="true" data-val-required="You must select an option" id="TestRadio_1" name="TestRadio" type="radio" value="1" />Line1</label>Di2015NewLine                    sb.AppendFormat("<label>{0} {1}</label> ", radio, HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(item.Text));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sb.Append(" </span>");Di2015NewLine            return MvcHtmlString.Create(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

14966433Di2015UniqueSeparator(0, 0)
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparator1.65
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparator5000
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparator1.6
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparator10000
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparatory == 1.57 * x
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparator(0, 0)
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparator1.57
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparatory == 1.57 * x
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparatorprice
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparator1.57
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparatorprice[0]
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparatorprice
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparatorquantity
14966433Di2015UniqueSeparator        decimal[] price = { 1.65m, 1.6m, 1.55m, 1.4m, 1.3m, };Di2015NewLine        long[] quantity = { 5000, 10000, 12000, 20000, 50000, };Di2015NewLine        decimal desiredAverage = 1.57m;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int length = price.Length;Di2015NewLine        if (length != quantity.Length)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var abscissaValues = new long[length + 1];Di2015NewLine        var ordinateValues = new decimal[length + 1];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= length; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                abscissaValues[i] += quantity[j];Di2015NewLine                ordinateValues[i] += price[j] * quantity[j];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } // calculation of plot completeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int segmentNumber = Enumerable.Range(1, length).FirstOrDefault(i => ordinateValues[i] / abscissaValues[i] <= desiredAverage);Di2015NewLine        if (segmentNumber > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            decimal x = (ordinateValues[segmentNumber - 1] * abscissaValues[segmentNumber] - abscissaValues[segmentNumber - 1] * ordinateValues[segmentNumber])Di2015NewLine                / (desiredAverage * (abscissaValues[segmentNumber] - abscissaValues[segmentNumber - 1]) - (ordinateValues[segmentNumber] - ordinateValues[segmentNumber - 1]));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Found solution x == " + x);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("No solution");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

14967693Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MyExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static TSource MinOf<TSource>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine        Func<TSource, int> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get the enumerator.Di2015NewLine        var enumerator = source.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        if (!enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("The source sequence is empty.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Take the first value as a minimum.Di2015NewLine        int minimum = selector(enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine        TSource current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Go through all other values...Di2015NewLine        while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int value = selector(enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine            if (value < minimum)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // A new minimum was found. Store it.Di2015NewLine                minimum = value;Di2015NewLine                current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the minimum value.Di2015NewLine        return current;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14974649Di2015UniqueSeparator    using System;Di2015NewLine    using System.Net;Di2015NewLine    using System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLine    using System.Text;Di2015NewLine    using System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // State object for reading client data asynchronouslyDi2015NewLine    public class StateObject {Di2015NewLine        // Client  socket.Di2015NewLine        public Socket workSocket = null;Di2015NewLine        // Size of receive buffer.Di2015NewLine        public const int BufferSize = 1024;Di2015NewLine        // Receive buffer.Di2015NewLine        public byte[] buffer = new byte[BufferSize];Di2015NewLine    // Received data string.Di2015NewLine        public StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();  Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class AsynchronousSocketListener {Di2015NewLine        // Thread signal.Di2015NewLine        public static ManualResetEvent allDone = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public AsynchronousSocketListener() {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void StartListening() {Di2015NewLine            // Data buffer for incoming data.Di2015NewLine            byte[] bytes = new Byte[1024];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Establish the local endpoint for the socket.Di2015NewLine            // The DNS name of the computerDi2015NewLine            // running the listener is "host.contoso.com".Di2015NewLine            IPHostEntry ipHostInfo = Dns.Resolve(Dns.GetHostName());Di2015NewLine            IPAddress ipAddress = ipHostInfo.AddressList[0];Di2015NewLine            IPEndPoint localEndPoint = new IPEndPoint(ipAddress, 11000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create a TCP/IP socket.Di2015NewLine            Socket listener = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork,Di2015NewLine                SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Bind the socket to the local endpoint and listen for incoming connections.Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                listener.Bind(localEndPoint);Di2015NewLine                listener.Listen(100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (true) {Di2015NewLine                    // Set the event to nonsignaled state.Di2015NewLine                    allDone.Reset();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Start an asynchronous socket to listen for connections.Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Waiting for a connection...");Di2015NewLine                    listener.BeginAccept( Di2015NewLine                        new AsyncCallback(AcceptCallback),Di2015NewLine                        listener );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Wait until a connection is made before continuing.Di2015NewLine                    allDone.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            } catch (Exception e) {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(e.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\nPress ENTER to continue...");Di2015NewLine            Console.Read();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void AcceptCallback(IAsyncResult ar) {Di2015NewLine            // Signal the main thread to continue.Di2015NewLine            allDone.Set();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the socket that handles the client request.Di2015NewLine            Socket listener = (Socket) ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine            Socket handler = listener.EndAccept(ar);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create the state object.Di2015NewLine            StateObject state = new StateObject();Di2015NewLine            state.workSocket = handler;Di2015NewLine            handler.BeginReceive( state.buffer, 0, StateObject.BufferSize, 0,Di2015NewLine                new AsyncCallback(ReadCallback), state);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void ReadCallback(IAsyncResult ar) {Di2015NewLine            String content = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Retrieve the state object and the handler socketDi2015NewLine            // from the asynchronous state object.Di2015NewLine            StateObject state = (StateObject) ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine            Socket handler = state.workSocket;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Read data from the client socket. Di2015NewLine            int bytesRead = handler.EndReceive(ar);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (bytesRead > 0) {Di2015NewLine                // There  might be more data, so store the data received so far.Di2015NewLine                state.sb.Append(Encoding.ASCII.GetString(Di2015NewLine                    state.buffer,0,bytesRead));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Check for end-of-file tag. If it is not there, read Di2015NewLine                // more data.Di2015NewLine                content = state.sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine                if (content.IndexOf("<EOF>") > -1) {Di2015NewLine                    // All the data has been read from the Di2015NewLine                    // client. Display it on the console.Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Read {0} bytes from socket. \\n Data : {1}",Di2015NewLine                        content.Length, content );Di2015NewLine                    // Echo the data back to the client.Di2015NewLine                    Send(handler, content);Di2015NewLine                } else {Di2015NewLine                    // Not all data received. Get more.Di2015NewLine                    handler.BeginReceive(state.buffer, 0, StateObject.BufferSize, 0,Di2015NewLine                    new AsyncCallback(ReadCallback), state);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Send(Socket handler, String data) {Di2015NewLine            // Convert the string data to byte data using ASCII encoding.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      byte[] byteData = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Begin sending the data to the remote device.Di2015NewLine        handler.BeginSend(byteData, 0, byteData.Length, 0,Di2015NewLine            new AsyncCallback(SendCallback), handler);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void SendCallback(IAsyncResult ar) {Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            // Retrieve the socket from the state object.Di2015NewLine            Socket handler = (Socket) ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Complete sending the data to the remote device.Di2015NewLine            int bytesSent = handler.EndSend(ar);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Sent {0} bytes to client.", bytesSent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            handler.Shutdown(SocketShutdown.Both);Di2015NewLine            handler.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        } catch (Exception e) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(e.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int Main(String[] args) {Di2015NewLine        StartListening();Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14979491Di2015UniqueSeparatorResizeForm()
14979491Di2015UniqueSeparatorResolution objFormResizer = new Resolution();Di2015NewLine            objFormResizer.ResizeForm(this, 768, 1024); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public class ResolutionDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            float heightRatio = new float();Di2015NewLine            float widthRatio = new float();Di2015NewLine            int standardHeight, standardWidth;Di2015NewLine            public void ResizeForm(Form objForm, int DesignerHeight, int DesignerWidth)Di2015NewLine            {           Di2015NewLine                standardHeight = DesignerHeight;           Di2015NewLine                standardWidth = DesignerWidth;Di2015NewLine                int presentHeight = Screen.PrimaryScreen.WorkingArea.Height;//.Bounds.Height;Di2015NewLine                int presentWidth = Screen.PrimaryScreen.Bounds.Width;Di2015NewLine                heightRatio = (float)((float)presentHeight / (float)standardHeight);Di2015NewLine                widthRatio = (float)((float)presentWidth / (float)standardWidth);Di2015NewLine                objForm.AutoScaleMode = AutoScaleMode.None;Di2015NewLine                objForm.Scale(new SizeF(widthRatio, heightRatio));Di2015NewLine                foreach (Control c in objForm.Controls)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (c.HasChildren)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ResizeControlStore(c); 14984139Di2015UniqueSeparator// convert tree into collection of value setsDi2015NewLinepublic IEnumerable<List<string>> ExplodeValueSets(T tree, int cIndex = 0) {Di2015NewLine    // recursive portion as long as there are more columns to processDi2015NewLine    if (cIndex < tree.column.Length) {Di2015NewLine        // recursive generate list for rest of columnsDi2015NewLine        var subResult = ExplodeValueSets(tree, cIndex + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // combine values in this column with recursively-generatedDi2015NewLine        // sets from rest of columns to build up larger setsDi2015NewLine        foreach (var result in subResult)Di2015NewLine            foreach (var value in tree.column[cIndex].value)Di2015NewLine                yield return new List<string> { value.fieldVal }.Concat(result).ToList();Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        // base condition - all columns are processed, so return empty listDi2015NewLine        yield return new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14984139Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GenerateSQL(T tree) {Di2015NewLine    var valueSets = ExplodeValueSets(tree);Di2015NewLine    var sql = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var set in valueSets)Di2015NewLine        sql.AppendLine(GenerateSingleSQLInsert(tree, set));Di2015NewLine    var finalSql = sql.ToString();Di2015NewLine    return finalSql;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string GenerateSingleSQLInsert(T tree, List<string> values) {Di2015NewLine    var sqlFormat = "insert into [{0}]([{1}]) values('{2}');";Di2015NewLine    var table = tree.tableName;Di2015NewLine    var columnList = string.Join("],[", tree.column.Select (c => c.className).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    var valueList = string.Join("','", values.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    var sql = string.Format(sqlFormat, table, columnList, valueList);Di2015NewLine    return sql;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14987898Di2015UniqueSeparatorToolStripItem
14987898Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Form1()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<IMenu> menuItems = new List<IMenu>() { new UpdateMenuItems(), new MenuItem(), new MenuItem2() };Di2015NewLine    MergeMenus(this.menuStrip1.Items, menuItems.Select(m => m.ToolStripItem));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Recursive function that merges two ToolStripItem trees into oneDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="existingItems">Collection of existing ToolStripItems</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="newItems">Collection of new ToolStripItems. IEnumerable instead of ToolStripItemCollection to allow for items without an owner</param>Di2015NewLineprivate void MergeMenus(ToolStripItemCollection existingItems, IEnumerable<ToolStripItem> newItems)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int count = newItems.Count();Di2015NewLine    int removedFromCollection = 0; // keep track of items that are removed from the newItems collection Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ToolStripItem newItem = newItems.ElementAt(i - removedFromCollection);Di2015NewLine        bool merged = false;Di2015NewLine        string key = newItem.Name; // the items are identified and compared by its nameDi2015NewLine        if (existingItems.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ToolStripItem existingItem = existingItems[key];Di2015NewLine            if (existingItem != null && existingItem.GetType().Equals(newItem.GetType()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // check if the matching items are ToolStripMenuItems. if so, merge their children recursivelyDi2015NewLine                if (newItem is ToolStripMenuItem)Di2015NewLine                    MergeMenus(((ToolStripMenuItem)existingItem).DropDownItems, ((ToolStripMenuItem)newItem).DropDownItems.Cast<ToolStripItem>());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // do not add this particular item (existing item with same name and type found)Di2015NewLine                merged = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!merged) // newItem does not exist in existingItems (or not as the same type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // if there was an owner, the item will be removed from the collection and the next element's index needs to be adjustedDi2015NewLine            if (newItem.Owner != null) Di2015NewLine                removedFromCollection++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // add item to the existing treeDi2015NewLine            existingItems.Add(newItem);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14990146Di2015UniqueSeparator    public a Traverse(IQueryable<q> qList, string id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.GatherAs(qList).FirstOrDefault(a => a.Id == id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IQueryable<a> GatherAs(IQueryable<q> qList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IQueryable<a> aList = qList.SelectMany(q => q.aList);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (aList.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine            aList = aList.Union(this.GatherAs(aList.SelectMany(a => a.qList)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return aList;       Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14990851Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class IdentityHelper {Di2015NewLine  [DllImport("advapi32.dll")]Di2015NewLine  private static extern int LogonUserA( String lpszUserName, String lpszDomain, String lpszPassword, int dwLogonType, int dwLogonProvider, ref IntPtr phToken );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  [DllImport("advapi32.dll",Di2015NewLine    CharSet = CharSet.Auto,Di2015NewLine    SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine  private static extern int DuplicateToken( IntPtr hToken, int impersonationLevel, ref IntPtr hNewToken );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  [DllImport("kernel32.dll",Di2015NewLine    CharSet = CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLine  private static extern bool CloseHandle( IntPtr handle );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public const int LOGON32_LOGON_INTERACTIVE = 2;Di2015NewLine  public const int LOGON32_PROVIDER_DEFAULT = 0;Di2015NewLine  public const int IMPERSONATION_LEVEL_IMPERSONATE = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static WindowsIdentity Logon( string username, string password, string domain = "" ) {Di2015NewLine    IntPtr token = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    WindowsIdentity wid = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if( domain == "" ) {Di2015NewLine      split_username(username, ref username, ref domain);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if( LogonUserA(username, domain, password, LOGON32_LOGON_INTERACTIVE, LOGON32_PROVIDER_DEFAULT, ref token) != 0 ) {Di2015NewLine      wid = WIDFromToken(token);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if( token != IntPtr.Zero ) CloseHandle(token);Di2015NewLine    return wid;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static WindowsIdentity WIDFromToken( IntPtr src ) {Di2015NewLine    WindowsIdentity wid = null;Di2015NewLine    IntPtr token = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    if( DuplicateToken(src, IMPERSONATION_LEVEL_IMPERSONATE, ref token) != 0 ) {Di2015NewLine      wid = new WindowsIdentity(token);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if( token != IntPtr.Zero ) CloseHandle(token);Di2015NewLine    return wid;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static void split_username( string username, ref string username_out, ref string domain_out ) {Di2015NewLine    string[] composite_username = username.Split(new char[] { '\\\\' });Di2015NewLine    if( composite_username.Length == 2 ) {Di2015NewLine      domain_out = 14992620Di2015UniqueSeparatorDateTime arrivalDate = new DateTime(2012, 10, 15);Di2015NewLineDateTime releaseDate = new DateTime(2013, 01, 20);Di2015NewLineDateTime enteredDate = new DateTime(2012, 10, 01);Di2015NewLineDateTime enteredEnd = new DateTime(2012, 12, 31);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Whichever of { arrivalDate, enteredDate } is laterDi2015NewLineDateTime startOverlap = arrivalDate <= enteredDate ? enteredDate : arrivalDate;Di2015NewLine// Whichever of { releaseDate, enteredEnd } is earlierDi2015NewLineDateTime endOverlap = enteredEnd <= releaseDate ? enteredEnd : releaseDate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTimeSpan totalOverlap = endOverlap - startOverlap;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("There are {0} days of overlap.", totalOverlap.Days);Di2015NewLine

14995130Di2015UniqueSeparator(from parents in collectionDi2015NewLinefrom all in collectionDi2015NewLinewhereDi2015NewLine    parents.ValidFlag == 1 &&Di2015NewLine    parents.ParentId == null &&Di2015NewLine    all.ValidFlag == 1 &&Di2015NewLine    (all.ParentId == null || all.ParentId == parents.Id)Di2015NewLineselect all).Distinct();Di2015NewLine

14996575Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WindowsFormsExamplesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class OnlyOneThread : FormDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<ManualResetEvent> threadStopEvents;    //This will hold stop events for running threadsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public OnlyOneThread()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine            threadStopEvents = new List<ManualResetEvent>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void runThreadBtn_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ManualResetEvent evt = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine            ParameterizedThreadStart ts = new ParameterizedThreadStart(this.ThreadFunc);Di2015NewLine            Thread t = new Thread(ts);Di2015NewLine            t.Start(evt);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private delegate void UptadeThreadCountDelegate();   //This delegate is used by Invoke methodDi2015NewLine        private void UpdateThreadCount()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            threadcountLbl.Text = threadStopEvents.Count.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnClosed(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            base.OnClosed(e);Di2015NewLine            //We must stop threads if they are still runningDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (threadStopEvents)  // locking prevents simultaneous list accessDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (ManualResetEvent evt in threadStopEvents)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    evt.Set(); //signal all eventsDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //This is thread functionDi2015NewLine        private void ThreadFunc(Object obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ManualResetEvent stopEvent = obj as ManualResetEvent; //cast an object that was passed by Thread.Start()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (threadStopEvents) // locking prevents simultaneous list accessDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (ManualResetEvent evt in threadStopEvents)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    evt.Set(); //signal all events for all other threads to stopDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                threadStopEvents.Add(stopEvent);  //Put our event on listDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (this.IsHandleCreated) // This is necessary for invocationDi2015NewLine                this.Invoke(new UptadeThreadCountDelegate(this.UpdateThreadCount));  //Invoke counter updateDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 60; i++) // this will run about 1 minuteDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (stopEvent.WaitOne(0)) // Tests stopEvent and continuesDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Stop signaled!!! exit!Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(1000); //Sleep 1 secondDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            lock (threadStopEvents) // locking prevents simultaneous list accessDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                threadStopEvents.Remove(stopEvent); //remove stop event from listDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (this.IsHandleCreated) // This is necessary for invocationDi2015NewLine                this.Invoke(new UptadeThreadCountDelegate(this.UpdateThreadCount));  //Invoke counter updateDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14998648Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string Generate(int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // also, seed your random so you don't get the same passwordDi2015NewLine    Random random = new Random((int)DateTime.Now.Ticks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    char[] chars = "$%#@!*abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz1234567890?;:ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ^&".ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine    string password = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < chars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int x = random.Next(0, chars.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!password.Contains(chars.GetValue(x).ToString()))Di2015NewLine            password += chars.GetValue(x);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            i--;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (length < password.Length) password = password.Substring(0, length);Di2015NewLine    return password;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14999674Di2015UniqueSeparator    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        var dto = GroupedDtoWorker.GetIt();Di2015NewLine        dataGridView.Columns.Add("units", "units");Di2015NewLine        foreach (GroupedDto groupedDto in dto)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> keyValuePair in groupedDto.DateMessage)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!dataGridView.Columns.Contains(keyValuePair.Key))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dataGridView.Columns.Add(keyValuePair.Key, keyValuePair.Key);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        dataGridView.Columns.Add("count", "count");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (GroupedDto groupedDto in dto)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String[] row = new string[dataGridView.Columns.Count];Di2015NewLine            row[0] = groupedDto.Unit.ToString();Di2015NewLine            row[dataGridView.Columns.Count - 1] = groupedDto.Count.ToString();Di2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> keyValuePair in groupedDto.DateMessage)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Int32 index = dataGridView.Columns[keyValuePair.Key].Index;Di2015NewLine                row[index] = keyValuePair.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            dataGridView.Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

set; }Di2015NewLine    public TimeSpan EndTime { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class TimeBandComparer : IComparer {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public int Compare(object x, object y) {Di2015NewLinevar xTb = x as TimeBand;Di2015NewLinevar yTb = y as TimeBand;Di2015NewLinereturn (xTb.StartTime == yTb.StartTime && xTb.EndTime == yTb.EndTime)Di2015NewLine         ? 0Di2015NewLine         : -1;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class TimebandEqualityComparer : IEqualityComparer<TimeBand> {Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(TimeBand x, TimeBand y) {Di2015NewLinereturn x.StartTime == y.StartTime && x.EndTime == y.EndTime;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(TimeBand obj) {Di2015NewLinereturn obj.StartTime.GetHashCode() ^ obj.EndTime.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15005530Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass SerialPortEventDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private SerialPort mySerialPort;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Action<byte[]> DataReceived;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Created the actual serial port in the constructor here, Di2015NewLine    //as it makes more sense than having the caller need to do it.Di2015NewLine    //you'll also need access to it in the event handler to read the dataDi2015NewLine    public SerialPortEvent()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        mySerialPort = new SerialPort("COM81");Di2015NewLine        mySerialPort.DataReceived += mySerialPort_DataReceivedDi2015NewLine        myserialPort.open();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void mySerialPort_DataReceived(object sender, SerialDataReceivedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //no. of data at the portDi2015NewLine            int ByteToRead = mySerialPort.BytesToRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //create array to store buffer dataDi2015NewLine            byte[] inputData = new byte[ByteToRead];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //read the data and storeDi2015NewLine            mySerialPort.Read(inputData, 0, ByteToRead);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var copy = DataReceived;Di2015NewLine            if(copy != null) copy(inputData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (SystemException ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(ex.Message, "Data Received Event");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15007717Di2015UniqueSeparator// Watches a task and raises property-changed notifications when the task completes.Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class TaskCompletionNotifier<TResult> : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public TaskCompletionNotifier(Task<TResult> task)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Task = task;Di2015NewLine        if (!task.IsCompleted)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var scheduler = (SynchronizationContext.Current == null) ? TaskScheduler.Current : TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext();Di2015NewLine            task.ContinueWith(t =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var propertyChanged = PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine                if (propertyChanged != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    propertyChanged(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs("IsCompleted"));Di2015NewLine                    if (t.IsCanceled)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        propertyChanged(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs("IsCanceled"));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (t.IsFaulted)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        propertyChanged(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs("IsFaulted"));Di2015NewLine                        propertyChanged(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs("ErrorMessage"));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        propertyChanged(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs("IsSuccessfullyCompleted"));Di2015NewLine                        propertyChanged(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs("Result"));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            },Di2015NewLine            CancellationToken.None,Di2015NewLine            TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously,Di2015NewLine            scheduler);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets the task being watched. This property never changes and is never <c>null</c>.Di2015NewLine    public Task<TResult> Task { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task ITaskCompletionNotifier.TaskDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return Task; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets the result of the task. Returns the default value of TResult if the task has not completed successfully.Di2015NewLine    public TResult Result { get { return (Task.Status == TaskStatus.RanToCompletion) ? Task.Result : default(TResult); } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets whether the task has completed.Di2015NewLine    public bool IsCompleted { get { return Task.IsCompleted; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets whether the task has completed successfully.Di2015NewLine    public bool IsSuccessfullyCompleted { get { return Task.Status == TaskStatus.RanToCompletion; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets whether the task has been canceled.Di2015NewLine    public bool IsCanceled { get { return Task.IsCanceled; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets whether the task has faulted.Di2015NewLine    public bool IsFaulted { get { return Task.IsFaulted; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets the error message for the original faulting exception for the task. Returns <c>null</c> if the task is not faulted.Di2015NewLine    public string ErrorMessage { get { return (InnerException == null) ? null : InnerException.Message; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15009754Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum ChunkTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Weekly,Di2015NewLine    Monthly,Di2015NewLine    YearlyDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic IEnumerable<IEnumerable<DateTime>> ChunkDates(IEnumerable<DateTime> collection, ChunkType chunkBy)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch(chunkBy)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case ChunkType.Weekly:Di2015NewLine            // roughly equals by day of weekDi2015NewLine            return collection.GroupBy(dt => dt.DayOfWeek).Select(grp => grp.ToList());Di2015NewLine        case ChunkType.Monthly:Di2015NewLine            // Trickier - assume by ordinal day of month?Di2015NewLine            return collection.GroupBy(dt => dt.Day).Select(grp => grp.ToList());Di2015NewLine        case ChunkType.Yearly:Di2015NewLine            // Trickier - assume by ordinal day of year?Di2015NewLine            return collection.GroupBy(dt => dt.DayOfYear).Select(grp => grp.ToList());        Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new[]{ collection };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar date1 = DateTime.Today;Di2015NewLinevar date2 = DateTime.Today.AddDays(7);Di2015NewLinevar date3 = DateTime.Today.AddDays(3);Di2015NewLinevar date4 = DateTime.Today.AddDays(8*7);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar collectionOfDateTime = new List<DateTime>() { date1, date2, date3, date4};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach(var type in new [] { ChunkType.Weekly, ChunkType.Monthly, ChunkType.Yearly })Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Now grouping by:" + type);Di2015NewLine    var grouped = ChunkDates(collectionOfDateTime, type);Di2015NewLine    foreach(var groupOfDates in grouped)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("New group!");Di2015NewLine        foreach (var value in groupOfDates)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15013258Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] array = { "RS01", "RS10", "RS32A", "RS102", Di2015NewLine                   "RS80", "RS05A", "RS105A", "RS105B" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineArray.Sort(array, (s1, s2) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Regex regex = new Regex(@"([a-zA-Z]+)(\\d+)([a-zA-Z]*)");Di2015NewLine        var match1 = regex.Match(s1);                                        Di2015NewLine        var match2 = regex.Match(s2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // prefixDi2015NewLine        int result = match1.Groups[1].Value.CompareTo(match2.Groups[1].Value);Di2015NewLine        if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // number Di2015NewLine        result = Int32.Parse(match1.Groups[2].Value)Di2015NewLine                        .CompareTo(Int32.Parse(match2.Groups[2].Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // suffixDi2015NewLine        return match1.Groups[3].Value.CompareTo(match2.Groups[3].Value);Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine
15013258Di2015UniqueSeparatorArray.Sort(array, new RSComparer());Di2015NewLine
15013258Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RSComparer : IComparer<string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, RS> entries = new Dictionary<string, RS>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!entries.ContainsKey(x))Di2015NewLine            entries.Add(x, new RS(x));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!entries.ContainsKey(y))Di2015NewLine            entries.Add(y, new RS(y));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return entries[x].CompareTo(entries[y]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class RS : IComparableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public RS(string value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Regex regex = new Regex(@"([A-Z]+)(\\d+)([A-Z]*)");Di2015NewLine            var match = regex.Match(value);Di2015NewLine            Prefix = match.Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLine            Number = Int32.Parse(match.Groups[2].Value);Di2015NewLine            Suffix = match.Groups[3].Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Prefix { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public int Number { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Suffix { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int CompareTo(object obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RS rs = (RS)obj;Di2015NewLine            int result = Prefix.CompareTo(rs.Prefix);Di2015NewLine            if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result = Number.CompareTo(rs.Number);Di2015NewLine            if (result != null)Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Suffix.CompareTo(rs.Suffix);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15014046Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool GenericCompareLists<T1, T2>(List<T1> cdssList, List<T2> spamisList, object sender, Func<T1, T2, bool> filterLambda ,  Func<T1, T2, bool> compareLambda )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool passed = true;Di2015NewLine    foreach ( T2 spamisCv in spamisList )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<T1> cdssSubList = cdssList.Where(l => filterLambda(l, spamisCv)).ToList();Di2015NewLine        if ( cdssSubList.Count != 1 )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            log.Error( "..." );Di2015NewLine            passed = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T1 cdssCv = cdssSubList.First();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ( compareLambda( cdssCv, spamisCv) )// comparing the sum of all check_amt for this type, cdss vs spamis - EWBDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                log.Error( "Failed in comparison f" + sender.ToString()  );Di2015NewLine                passed = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return passed;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15014248Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool connect(string comPort, Form1 whichForm) {Di2015NewLine
15014248Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool connect(string comPort, Form1 whichForm) {Di2015NewLine    BTserial = new SerialPort(comPort, 9600, Parity.None, 8, StopBits.One);Di2015NewLine    BTserial.Open();Di2015NewLine    if (BTserial.IsOpen) {Di2015NewLine        BTserial.DataReceived += (sender, e) => {Di2015NewLine          Debug.WriteLine("Data Incomming!");Di2015NewLine          // Check if Chars are receivedDi2015NewLine          if (e.EventType == SerialData.Chars) {Di2015NewLine              Debug.WriteLine("Chars!");Di2015NewLine              // Create new bufferDi2015NewLine              byte[] ReadBuffer = new byte[BTserial.BytesToRead];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              // Read bytes from bufferDi2015NewLine              BTserial.Read(ReadBuffer, 0, ReadBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine              BTserial.DiscardInBuffer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              // Encode to stringDi2015NewLine              string data = bytesToString(ReadBuffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              Action toBeRunOnGuiThread = () => whichForm.theTextBox.Text = data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              // to guard yourself from all evilDi2015NewLine              // you could check to see if it is needed toDi2015NewLine              if (whichForm.InvokeRequired) Di2015NewLine                // marshal the call to the action all the way to the GUI threadDi2015NewLine                whichForm.Invoke(toBeRunOnGuiThread);Di2015NewLine              elseDi2015NewLine                // or, if we ARE on the GUI thread already, just call it from this threadDi2015NewLine                toBeRunOnGuiThread();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              ReadBuffer = null;Di2015NewLine              data = null;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15015131Di2015UniqueSeparator        private const int WM_SYSCOMMAND = 0X112;Di2015NewLine    private HwndSource hwndSource;Di2015NewLine    enum SWP : uintDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        NOSIZE = 0x0001 ,Di2015NewLine        NOMOVE = 0x0002 ,Di2015NewLine        NOZORDER = 0x0004 ,Di2015NewLine        NOREDRAW = 0x0008 ,Di2015NewLine        NOACTIVATE = 0x0010 ,Di2015NewLine        FRAMECHANGED = 0x0020 ,  Di2015NewLine        SHOWWINDOW = 0x0040 ,Di2015NewLine        HIDEWINDOW = 0x0080 ,Di2015NewLine        NOCOPYBITS = 0x0100 ,Di2015NewLine        NOOWNERZORDER = 0x0200 , Di2015NewLine        NOSENDCHANGING = 0x0400 , Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override void OnApplyTemplate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.IntPtr handle = ( new WindowInteropHelper( this ) ).Handle;Di2015NewLine        HwndSource.FromHwnd( handle ).AddHook( new HwndSourceHook( WindowProc ) );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private System.IntPtr WindowProc( System.IntPtr hwnd , int msg , System.IntPtr wParam , System.IntPtr lParam , ref bool handled )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch ( msg )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 0x0024:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    WmGetMinMaxInfo( hwnd , lParam );Di2015NewLine                    handled = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case 0x0046:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    WINDOWPOS pos = ( WINDOWPOS )Marshal.PtrToStructure( lParam , typeof( WINDOWPOS ) );Di2015NewLine                    if ( ( pos.flags & ( int )(SWP.NOMOVE) ) != 0 )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Window wnd = ( Window )HwndSource.FromHwnd( hwnd ).RootVisual;Di2015NewLine                    if ( wnd == null )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    bool changedPos = false;Di2015NewLine                    if ( pos.cx < MinWidth ) { pos.cx = (int)MinWidth; changedPos = true; }Di2015NewLine                    if ( pos.cy < MinHeight ) { pos.cy = ( int )MinHeight; changedPos = true; }Di2015NewLine                    if ( !changedPos )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Marshal.StructureToPtr( pos , lParam , true );Di2015NewLine                    handled = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return ( System.IntPtr )0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void WmGetMinMaxInfo( System.IntPtr hwnd , System.IntPtr lParam )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MINMAXINFO mmi = ( MINMAXINFO )Marshal.PtrToStructure( lParam , typeof( MINMAXINFO ) );Di2015NewLine        int MONITOR_DEFAULTTONEAREST = 0x00000002;Di2015NewLine monitorInfo = new MONITORINFO();Di2015NewLine            GetMonitorInfo( monitor , monitorInfo );Di2015NewLine            RECT rcWorkArea = monitorInfo.rcWork;Di2015NewLine            RECT rcMonitorArea = monitorInfo.rcMonitor;Di2015NewLine            mmi.ptMaxPosition.x = Math.Abs( rcWorkArea.left - rcMonitorArea.left );Di2015NewLine            mmi.ptMaxPosition.y = Math.Abs( rcWorkArea.top - rcMonitorArea.top );Di2015NewLine            mmi.ptMaxSize.x = Math.Abs( rcWorkArea.right - rcWorkArea.left );Di2015NewLine            mmi.ptMaxSize.y = Math.Abs( rcWorkArea.bottom - rcWorkArea.top );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Marshal.StructureToPtr( mmi , lParam , true );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    [StructLayout( LayoutKind.Sequential )]Di2015NewLine    public struct POINTDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int x;Di2015NewLine        public int y;Di2015NewLine        public POINT( int x , int y )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine ptMinTrackSize;Di2015NewLine        public POINT ptMaxTrackSize;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    [StructLayout( LayoutKind.Sequential , CharSet = CharSet.Auto )]Di2015NewLine    public class MONITORINFODi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int cbSize = Marshal.SizeOf( typeof( MONITORINFO ) );Di2015NewLine        public RECT rcMonitor = new RECT();Di2015NewLine        public RECT {Di2015NewLine        public int left;Di2015NewLine        public int top;Di2015NewLine        public int right;Di2015NewLine        public int bottom;Di2015NewLine        public static readonly RECT Empty = new RECT();Di2015NewLine        public int WidthDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return Math.Abs( right - left ); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public int HeightDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return bottom - top; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public RECT( int left , int top , int right , int bottom )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.left = left;Di2015NewLine            this.top = top;Di2015NewLine            this.right = right;Di2015NewLine            this.bottom = bottom;Di2015NewLine rcSrc.right;Di2015NewLine            this.bottom = rcSrc.bottom;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public bool IsEmptyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine            if ( this == RECT.Empty ) { return "RECT {Empty}"; }Di2015NewLine            return "RECT { left : " + left + " / top : " + top + " / right : " + right + " / bottom : " + bottom + " }";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override bool Equals( object obj )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ( !( obj is Rect ) ) { return false; }Di2015NewLine            return ( this == ( RECT )obj );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return left.GetHashCode() + top.GetHashCode() + right.GetHashCode() + bottom.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static bool operator ==( RECT rect1 , RECT rect2 )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ( rect1.left == rect2.left && rect1.top == rect2.top && rect1.right == rect2.right && rect1.bottom == rect2.bottom );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static bool 15015337Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<String, Object> dictionary;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<String, Func<Object, bool>> validators;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyClass()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.dictionary = new Dictionary<String, Object>();Di2015NewLine        this.validators = new Dictionary<String, Func<Object, bool>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Put the default values in the dictionary.Di2015NewLine        this.dictionary["One"] = 10;Di2015NewLine        this.dictionary["Another"] = "ABC";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The validation functions:Di2015NewLine        this.validators["One"] = obj => ((int)obj) >= 0;Di2015NewLine        this.validators["Another"] = obj => obj != null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Object this[string name]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.dictionary[name]; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // This assumes the dictionary contains a default for _all_ names.Di2015NewLine            if (!this.dictionary.Contains(name))Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Name is invalid.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get a validator function. If there is one, it must return true.Di2015NewLine            Func<Object, bool> validator;Di2015NewLine            if (validators.TryGetValue(name, out validator) &&Di2015NewLine                !validator(value))Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Value is invalid.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Now set the value.Di2015NewLine            this.dictionary[name] = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15015738Di2015UniqueSeparatorCreate a Queue, and push the root onto it.Di2015NewLineLet Depth = 0Di2015NewLineLoop:Di2015NewLine    Let NodeCount = size(Queue)Di2015NewLine    If NodeCount is 0:Di2015NewLine        return Depth.Di2015NewLine    Increment Depth.Di2015NewLine    While NodeCount > 0:Di2015NewLine        Remove the node at the front of the queue.Di2015NewLine        Push its children, if any, on the back of the queueDi2015NewLine        Decrement NodeCount.Di2015NewLine

15020198Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static bool IsValidFollower(Vals val1, Vals val2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (val1 == Vals.IF)Di2015NewLine            return val2 == Vals.THEN;Di2015NewLine        if (val1 == Vals.THEN)Di2015NewLine            return val2 == Vals.ENDIF;Di2015NewLine        if (val1 == Vals.ENDIF)Di2015NewLine            return val2 == Vals.IF || val2 == Vals.ELSE;Di2015NewLine        if (val1 == Vals.ELSE)Di2015NewLine            return val2 == Vals.THEN;Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15024937Di2015UniqueSeparator[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLinepublic struct emxArray_real_TDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IntPtr data;Di2015NewLine    public IntPtr size;Di2015NewLine    public int allocatedSize;Di2015NewLine    public int numDimensions;Di2015NewLine    [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)]Di2015NewLine    public bool canFreeData;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class emxArray_real_T_Wrapper : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private emxArray_real_T value;Di2015NewLine    private GCHandle dataHandle;Di2015NewLine    private GCHandle sizeHandle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public emxArray_real_T Value {Di2015NewLine        get { return value; } Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public emxArray_real_T_Wrapper(double[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dataHandle = GCHandle.Alloc(data, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine        value.data = dataHandle.AddrOfPinnedObject();Di2015NewLine        sizeHandle = GCHandle.Alloc(new int[] { data.Length }, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine        value.size = sizeHandle.AddrOfPinnedObject();Di2015NewLine        value.allocatedSize = data.Length;Di2015NewLine        value.numDimensions = 1;Di2015NewLine        value.canFreeData = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dataHandle.Free();Di2015NewLine        sizeHandle.Free();Di2015NewLine        GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ~emxArray_real_T_Wrapper()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15029717Di2015UniqueSeparator[Target("DatabaseLog")]Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class DatabaseLogTarget : TargetWithLayoutDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public DatabaseLogTarget()Di2015NewLine this.SaveToDatabase(logEvent);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void SaveToDatabase(LogEventInfo logInfo)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (logInfo.Properties.ContainsKey("commandText") &&Di2015NewLine      logInfo.Properties["commandText"] != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      //Build the new connectionDi2015NewLine      SqlConnectionStringBuilder builder = new SqlConnectionStringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //use the connection string if it's presentDi2015NewLine      if (logInfo.Properties.ContainsKey("connectionString") && Di2015NewLine        logInfo.Properties["connectionString"] != null)Di2015NewLine        builder.ConnectionString = logInfo.Properties["connectionString"].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //set the hostDi2015NewLine      if (logInfo.Properties.ContainsKey("dbHost") &&Di2015NewLine        logInfo.Properties["dbHost"] != null)Di2015NewLine        builder.DataSource = logInfo.Properties["dbHost"].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //set the database to useDi2015NewLine      if (logInfo.Properties.ContainsKey("dbDatabase") &&Di2015NewLine        logInfo.Properties["dbDatabase"] != null)Di2015NewLine        builder.InitialCatalog = logInfo.Properties["dbDatabase"].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //if a user name and password are present, then we're not using integrated securityDi2015NewLine      if (logInfo.Properties.ContainsKey("dbUserName") && logInfo.Properties["dbUserName"] != null &&Di2015NewLine        logInfo.Properties.ContainsKey("dbPassword") && logInfo.Properties["dbPassword"] != null)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        builder.IntegratedSecurity = false;Di2015NewLine        builder.UserID = logInfo.Properties["dbUserName"].ToString();Di2015NewLine        builder.Password = logInfo.Properties["dbPassword"].ToString();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        builder.IntegratedSecurity = true;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Create the connectionDi2015NewLine      using (SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(builder.ToString()))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        //Create the commandDi2015NewLine        using (SqlCommand com = new SqlCommand(logInfo.Properties["commandText"].ToString(), conn))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          foreach (DatabaseParameterInfo dbi in logInfo.Parameters)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            //Add the parameter info, using Layout.Render() to get the actual valueDi2015NewLine            com.Parameters.AddWithValue(dbi.Name, dbi.Layout.Render(logInfo));Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          //open the connectionDi2015NewLine          com.Connection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          //Execute the sql commandDi2015NewLine          com.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
