15029717Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DatabaseLoggerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public Logger log = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public DatabaseLogger()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    //Make sure the custom target is registered for use BEFORE using itDi2015NewLine    ConfigurationItemFactory.Default.Targets.RegisterDefinition("DatabaseLog", typeof(DatabaseLogTarget));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //initialize the logDi2015NewLine    this.log = NLog.LogManager.GetLogger("LogDB");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// Logs a trace level NLog message</summary>Di2015NewLine  public void T(LogEventInfo info)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    info.Level = LogLevel.Trace;Di2015NewLine    this.Log(info);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// Allows for logging a trace exception message to multiple log sources.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  public void T(Exception e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.T(FormatError(e));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  //I also have overloads for all of the other log levels...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// Attaches the database connection information and parameter names and layoutsDi2015NewLine  /// to the outgoing LogEventInfo object. The custom database target usesDi2015NewLine  /// this to log the data.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="info"></param>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine  public virtual void Log(LogEventInfo info)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    info.Properties["dbHost"] = "SQLServer";Di2015NewLine    info.Properties["dbDatabase"] = "TempLogDB";Di2015NewLine    info.Properties["dbUserName"] = "username";Di2015NewLine    info.Properties["dbPassword"] = "password";Di2015NewLine    info.Properties["commandText"] = "exec InsertLog @LogDate, @LogLevel, @Location, @Message";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    info.Parameters = new DatabaseParameterInfo[] {Di2015NewLine      new DatabaseParameterInfo("@LogDate", Layout.FromString("${date:format=yyyy\\\\-MM\\\\-dd HH\\\\:mm\\\\:ss.fff}")), Di2015NewLine      new DatabaseParameterInfo("@LogLevel", Layout.FromString("${level}")),Di2015NewLine      new DatabaseParameterInfo("@Location", Layout.FromString("${event-context:item=location}")),Di2015NewLine      new DatabaseParameterInfo("@Message", Layout.FromString("${event-context:item=shortmessage}"))Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.log.Log(info);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// Creates a LogEventInfo object with a formatted message and Di2015NewLine  /// the location of the error.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  protected LogEventInfo FormatError(Exception e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    LogEventInfo info = new LogEventInfo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      info.TimeStamp = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Create the messageDi2015NewLine      string message = e.Message;Di2015NewLine      string location = "Unknown";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (e.TargetSite != null)Di2015NewLine        location = string.Format("[{0}] {1}", e.TargetSite.DeclaringType, e.TargetSite);Di2015NewLine      else if (e.Source != null && e.Source.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        location = e.Source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (e.InnerException != null && e.InnerException.Message.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        message += "\\nInnerException: " + e.InnerException.Message;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      info.Properties["location"] = location;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      info.Properties["shortmessage"] = message;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      info.Message = string.Format("{0} | {1}", location, message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception exp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      info.Properties["location"] = "SystemLogger.FormatError(Exception e)";Di2015NewLine      info.Properties["shortmessage"] = "Error creating error message";Di2015NewLine      info.Message = string.Format("{0} | {1}", "SystemLogger.FormatError(Exception e)", "Error creating error message");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return info;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

This is importantDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15034088Di2015UniqueSeparator// Access a configuration file using mapping. Di2015NewLine  // This function uses the OpenMappedExeConfiguration  Di2015NewLine  // method to access a new configuration file.    Di2015NewLine  // It also gets the custom ConsoleSection and  Di2015NewLine  // sets its ConsoleEment BackgroundColor and Di2015NewLine  // ForegroundColor properties to green and red Di2015NewLine  // respectively. Then it uses these properties to Di2015NewLine  // set the console colors.   Di2015NewLine  public static void MapExeConfiguration()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the application configuration file.Di2015NewLine    System.Configuration.Configuration config =Di2015NewLine      ConfigurationManager.OpenExeConfiguration(Di2015NewLine            ConfigurationUserLevel.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(config.FilePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (config == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine        "The configuration file does not exist.");Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine       "Use OpenExeConfiguration to create the file.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a new configuration file by saving  Di2015NewLine    // the application configuration to a new file. Di2015NewLine    string appName = Di2015NewLine      Environment.GetCommandLineArgs()[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string configFile =  string.Concat(appName, Di2015NewLine      ".2.config");Di2015NewLine    config.SaveAs(configFile, ConfigurationSaveMode.Full);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Map the new configuration file.Di2015NewLine    ExeConfigurationFileMap configFileMap = Di2015NewLine        new ExeConfigurationFileMap();Di2015NewLine    configFileMap.ExeConfigFilename = configFile;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the mapped configuration fileDi2015NewLine   config = Di2015NewLine      ConfigurationManager.OpenMappedExeConfiguration(Di2015NewLine        configFileMap, ConfigurationUserLevel.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Make changes to the new configuration file.  Di2015NewLine    // This is to show that this file is the  Di2015NewLine    // one that is used. Di2015NewLine    string sectionName = "consoleSection";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ConsoleSection customSection =Di2015NewLine      (ConsoleSection)config.GetSection(sectionName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (customSection == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        customSection = new ConsoleSection();Di2015NewLine        config.Sections.Add(sectionName, customSection);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else Di2015NewLine        // Change the section configuration values.Di2015NewLine        customSection =Di2015NewLine            (ConsoleSection)config.GetSection(sectionName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    customSection.ConsoleElement.BackgroundColor =Di2015NewLine        ConsoleColor.Green;Di2015NewLine    customSection.ConsoleElement.ForegroundColor =Di2015NewLine        ConsoleColor.Red;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Save the configuration file.Di2015NewLine    config.Save(ConfigurationSaveMode.Modified);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Force a reload of the changed section. This  Di2015NewLine    // makes the new values available for reading.Di2015NewLine    ConfigurationManager.RefreshSection(sectionName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set console properties using the  Di2015NewLine    // configuration values contained in the  Di2015NewLine    // new configuration file.Di2015NewLine    Console.BackgroundColor =Di2015NewLine      customSection.ConsoleElement.BackgroundColor;Di2015NewLine    Console.ForegroundColor =Di2015NewLine      customSection.ConsoleElement.ForegroundColor;Di2015NewLine    Console.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Using OpenMappedExeConfiguration.");Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Configuration file is: {0}", Di2015NewLine      config.FilePath);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

15038325Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic TreeNode[] GetNodes(IEnumerable<string> items, string prefix = "")Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int preLen = prefix.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // items that match the current prefix and have a nonzero character right afterDi2015NewLine    // the prefixDi2015NewLine    var candidates = items.Where(i => i.Length > preLen &&Di2015NewLine                                      i[preLen] != '0' &&Di2015NewLine                                      i.StartsWith(prefix));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create nodes from candidates that have a 0 two characters after the prefix.Di2015NewLine    // their child nodes are recursively generated from the candidate listDi2015NewLine    return candidates.Where(i => i.Length > preLen + 1 && i[preLen + 1] == '0')Di2015NewLine                     .Select(i => Di2015NewLine                          new TreeNode(i, GetNodes(candidates, prefix + i[preLen])))Di2015NewLine                     .ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15038732Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic boolean addChildren(Node root, Node[] children)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (root.children == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        root.children = children;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < root.children.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /* if it returns true then it was last level Di2015NewLine                   else break */Di2015NewLine            if(!addChildren(root.children[i], children)) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                /* this is non-last level break */Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15041201Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Func<T, object[]> MakeFieldGetter<T>() {Di2015NewLine    var arg = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "arg");Di2015NewLine    var body = Expression.NewArrayInit(Di2015NewLine        typeof(object)Di2015NewLine    ,   typeof(T).GetFields().Select(f => (Expression)Expression.Convert(Expression.Field(arg, f), typeof(object)))Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine   return (Func<T, object[]>)ExpressionDi2015NewLine        .Lambda(typeof(Func<T, object[]>), body, arg)Di2015NewLine        .Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15041201Di2015UniqueSeparatorobject[] GetFields(MyClass arg) {Di2015NewLine    return new object[] {Di2015NewLine        // The list of fields is generated through reflectionDi2015NewLine        // at the time of building the lambda. There is no reflection callsDi2015NewLine        // inside the working lambda, though: the field list is "baked into"Di2015NewLine        // the expression as if it were hard-coded manually.Di2015NewLine        (object)arg.Field1Di2015NewLine    ,   (object)arg.Field2Di2015NewLine    ,   (object)arg.Field3Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15041906Di2015UniqueSeparator    // create methodDi2015NewLine    Type arrayType = typeof(object[]);Di2015NewLine    Type intType = typeof(int);Di2015NewLine    DynamicMethod dm = new DynamicMethod(methodName, arrayType, new Type[] { intType });Di2015NewLine    ILGenerator il = dm.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create the array -- object[]Di2015NewLine    LocalBuilder arr = il.DeclareLocal(arrayType);Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4, 4);Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Newarr, typeof(object));Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Stloc, arr);  // <-- don't use direct addresses, use refs to LocalBuilder insteadDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // return the arrayDi2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, arr); // <-- don't use direct addresses, use refs to LocalBuilder insteadDi2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return dm;Di2015NewLine    object result = dm.Invoke(null, new object[] { 1 });Di2015NewLine

15042365Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FakeRootStreamReader : TextReaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly char[] _rootStart;Di2015NewLine    private static readonly char[] _rootEnd;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly TextReader _innerReader;Di2015NewLine    private int _charsRead;Di2015NewLine    private bool _eof;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static FakeRootStreamReader()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _rootStart = "<root>".ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine        _rootEnd = "</root>".ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FakeRootStreamReader(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _innerReader = new StreamReader(stream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FakeRootStreamReader(TextReader innerReader)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _innerReader = innerReader;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read(char[] buffer, int index, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_eof && _charsRead < _rootStart.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Prepend root elementDi2015NewLine            return ReadFake(_rootStart, buffer, index, count);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!_eof)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Normal reading operationDi2015NewLine            int charsRead = _innerReader.Read(buffer, index, count);Di2015NewLine            if (charsRead > 0) return charsRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // We've reached the end of the StreamDi2015NewLine            _eof = true;Di2015NewLine            _charsRead = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Append root element end tag at the end of the StreamDi2015NewLine        return ReadFake(_rootEnd, buffer, index, count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int ReadFake(char[] source, char[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int length = Math.Min(source.Length - _charsRead, count);Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(source, _charsRead, buffer, offset, length);Di2015NewLine        _charsRead += length;Di2015NewLine        return length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

StreamReaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public AmpersandFilterText(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine        : base(stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private StringBuilder sbBuffer = null;Di2015NewLine    private int bufferOffset = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ReadLine()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rawLine = base.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        rawLine = rawLine.Replace("&", "&");Di2015NewLine        return rawLine;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char cChar;Di2015NewLine        if (sbBuffer != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cChar = sbBuffer[bufferOffset];Di2015NewLine            bufferOffset++;Di2015NewLine            evalBuffer();Di2015NewLine            return cChar;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cChar = (char)base.Read();Di2015NewLine            if (cChar == '&')Di2015NewLine                sbBuffer = new StringBuilder("amp;");Di2015NewLine            return cChar;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read(char[] buffer, int index, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int destOffset = 0;Di2015NewLine        const string replacement = "&";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //exhaust our buffer firstDi2015NewLine        if (sbBuffer != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int bufferedToConsume = Math.Min(count, sbBuffer.Length - bufferOffset);Di2015NewLine            sbBuffer.CopyTo(bufferOffset, buffer, index, bufferedToConsume);Di2015NewLine            destOffset += bufferedToConsume;Di2015NewLine            bufferOffset += bufferedToConsume;Di2015NewLine            evalBuffer();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //then, if needed, read more dataDi2015NewLine        if (destOffset < count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char[] newBuffer = new char[count - destOffset];Di2015NewLine            var newRead = base.Read(newBuffer, 0, newBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //process new data and return directlyDi2015NewLine            int sourceOffset = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (sourceOffset < newRead && destOffset < count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                char tChar = newBuffer[sourceOffset];Di2015NewLine                if (tChar == '&')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int replacementOffset = 0;Di2015NewLine                    while (replacementOffset < replacement.Length && destOffset < count)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        buffer[destOffset + index] = replacement[replacementOffset];Di2015NewLine                        destOffset++;Di2015NewLine                        replacementOffset++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    sourceOffset++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //we did not copy the entire replacementDi2015NewLine                    if (replacementOffset < replacement.Length)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //put the remainder in next timeDi2015NewLine                        sbBuffer = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                        sbBuffer.Append(replacement, replacementOffset, replacement.Length - replacementOffset);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    buffer[destOffset + index] = tChar;Di2015NewLine                    destOffset++;Di2015NewLine                    sourceOffset++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //we have unused dataDi2015NewLine            if (sourceOffset < newRead)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (sbBuffer == null)Di2015NewLine                    sbBuffer = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //add data after replaceDi2015NewLine                for (; sourceOffset < newRead; sourceOffset++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    char tChar = newBuffer[sourceOffset];Di2015NewLine                    if (tChar == '&')Di2015NewLine                        sbBuffer.Append(replacement);Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        sbBuffer.Append(tChar);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return destOffset;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int ReadBlock(char[] buffer, int index, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.Read(buffer, index, count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Peek()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (sbBuffer != null)Di2015NewLine            return sbBuffer[bufferOffset];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return base.Peek();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ReadToEnd()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string cLine;Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sbTemp = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        while ((cLine = this.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine            sbTemp.AppendLine(cLine);Di2015NewLine        return sbTemp.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void evalBuffer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bufferOffset == sbBuffer.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //TODO: check perf on sbBuffer.ClearDi2015NewLine            sbBuffer = null;Di2015NewLine            bufferOffset = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15048682Di2015UniqueSeparatorBezierInterpolate
15048682Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Vector2 BezierInterpolate(Vector2 p0, Vector2 p1, Vector2 c0, Vector2 c1, float fraction)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // first stage, linear interpolate point pairs: [p0, c0], [c0, c1], [c1, p1]Di2015NewLine    Vector2 p0c0 = Vector2.Lerp(p0, c0, fraction);Di2015NewLine    Vector2 c0c1 = Vector2.Lerp(c0, c1, fraction);Di2015NewLine    Vector2 c1p1 = Vector2.Lerp(c1, p1, fraction);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // second stage, reduce to two pointsDi2015NewLine    Vector2 l = Vector2.Lerp(p0c0, c0c1, fraction);Di2015NewLine    Vector2 r = Vector2.Lerp(c0c1, c1p1, fraction);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // final stage, reduce to result point and returnDi2015NewLine    return Vector2.Lerp(l, r, fraction);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15048682Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic System.Random prng = new System.Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Vector2 genControlPoint(Vector2 l, Vector2 r)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // get a random angle between +/-(15..90) degrees off lineDi2015NewLine    float angle = (float)((((prng.NextDouble() * 5) + 1) / 12) * Math.PI * (prng.Next(0, 2) * 2 - 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create rotation matrixDi2015NewLine    Matrix rot = Matrix.CreateRotationZ(angle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get point offset half-way between two pointsDi2015NewLine    Vector2 ofs = Vector2.op_Multiply(Vector2.op_Subtract(l, r), 0.5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // apply rotationDi2015NewLine    ofs = Vector2.Transform(ofs, rot);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // return point as controlDi2015NewLine    return Vector2.op_Add(l, ofs);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine....Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineVector2 p0 = FlyStartPoint();Di2015NewLineVector2 p1 = FlyEndPoint();Di2015NewLine// generate randomized control points for flight pathDi2015NewLineVector2 c0 = genControlPoint(p0, p1);Di2015NewLineVector2 c1 = genControlPoint(p1, p0);Di2015NewLine
